|vendor_id = 14b9 |device_id = a505 |subvendor_id = 14b9 |subdevice_id = 6400 |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = LDK102044 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0A:F4
|chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETWC100K;Cisco Systems, (C) 08-0570-01, TNETWC100KGHK, 980E-26CFE4T, TAIWAN; |chip2 = Radiata;R-M11a;Cisco Systems, (C) 15-6810-01, TME051-14, R-M11a, 0210/CF9476.00, PHILIPPINES; |chip3 = Radiata;R-RF5; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{TagLine|'''Cisco Aironet''' 5 GHz 54 Mbps Wireless LAN Adapter ('''CB20''')}} <small>'''(47-13621-01 Rev A0)'''</small>
The board layout of the card below is a bit different than the FCC EUT's layout. .. It is, however, presumed to be using an '''Radiata''' R-RF5 RFIC.
